long_description: The Cycle Dog Park Pouch gives old bike tubes new life, repurposing them into a handy and durable dispenser for doggie pick-up bags. Park Pouch holds 1 standard-size roll of pick-up bags and comes with 6 rolls; each roll contains 12 bags. Decomposable pick-up bags are made of corn and plant starches. Carabiner clip and webbing loop make it easy to attach the Cycle Dog Park Pouch to a leash or belt loop.
short_description: The Cycle Dog Park Pouch gives old bike tubes new life, repurposing them into a handy and durable dispenser for doggie pick-up bags.
